Articles.Content:
> 
> 15 more pages till we reach 187.

At the rate we're going, that'll be before 6 pm (18:00); hype will possibly even pass .24's hype by then.

And Scott M. found a bug, where the stuff in the cargobay stays "bound" to the cargobay door-status, even after leaving it. he let out the plane, closed the cargobay and then the plane lost its airflow.

> 
> ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Oh. The crashes will compensate that.

> 
> At the rate we're going, that'll be before 6 pm (18:00); hype will possibly even pass .24's hype by then.

If we don't have any more crashes, maybe. I'm guessing the update is still about 24 hours away.

Next gif of the KSP forums:

![post-4032-0-46531500-1362448843.gif](http://thewiiu.com/uploads/monthly_03_2013/post-4032-0-46531500-1362448843.gif)
The forum refused to load for a good five-to-ten minutes. We're getting there!
Neogaf, wut.
My bowling alley has a kerbal painting... I'm hyping away from home!

> 
> This is what happened to the forums:
> [http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lpoplxPXkV1qg39ewo1_500.gif](https://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lpoplxPXkV1qg39ewo1_500.gif)

No SteamDB updates for 3 hours...

> 
> No SteamDB updates for 3 hours...

We've gone without no SteamDB updates for longer than that.
Does anyone know what time it will be released tomorrow?

> 
> Does anyone know what time it will be released tomorrow?

Nobody knows. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Does anyone know what time it will be released tomorrow?

Nope, it may have been rumored to be in the morning or maybe in the afternoon, but that's all they are, rumors, SQUAD hasn't said what time.

> 
> I was like 'random squirrel?' when I saw that as I was reading the post backwards, or rather looking at the images before text.
> <snip />

Squirrel's would make a nice addition to KSP, weird random failures.
I REALLY REALLY REALLY REALLY hope that these OOM crashes are the last ones that I should ever have with KSP. At least none that can be attributed to stock.
Ugh. I can't wait that long
